title: Seeking Inspiration
content: Hey everyone, it's been a while since I posted here. I'm looking for clever typography in Flash animations. Short movies where the text plays a prominent role and interacts visually with the images/animations. Letters morphing into shapes might be an example of what I'm looking for. Animations where type is the key element. Please share any examples you have. Thanks.
author: grod

comments.content:
Hi Noah,  
Try [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012054309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/kinetic%20type) link and maybe even [Carnegie Mellon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012054309/http:/www.design.cmu.edu/show_gallery.php?gid=26)
That's the one I posted, Jesse. : )

lol doh! i only saw the carnegie link :P

(runs and hides)
